displayName: Adjusting the claim balance during payment posting

text.text: ChatGPT How can I adjust the claim balance during payment posting?

text: To adjust the claim balance during payment posting, you can follow these steps: 1. On the Payments page, click Adjust balance. 2. In the Adjust Balance pop-up window, click the Payer field and select the payer type. 3. Select the adjustment type - write-off or revenue. 4. Click the Description field and select the reason for the adjustment. 5. Enter the adjustment amounts in the boxes under the Adjustment heading.

text.text: What are the exceptions to adjusting claim balances during payment posting?

text: Exceptions include facility, collections, or state debt payers.

text.text: Where do I find the option to adjust the claim balance on the Payments page?

text: To see balance adjustments, go to the Claim page and look in the following tabs: Credits tab inl Running claim balance.

text.text: What options do I have to select in the Adjust Balance pop-up window?

text: When the Adjust balance window opens, write-off is automatically selected as the adjustment type so all you have to do is click the Description field and then: 。 select a description from the list o enter the Description field 。 select a description from the list 。 and then enter the adjustment amount for each HCPCS.

text.text: What information do I need to provide in the Description field?

text: You can select a description from the list or enter the Description field. You can then enter the adjustment amount for each HCPCS.

text.text: How do I enter the adjustment amounts for write-offs or revenue adjustments?

text: To enter the adjustment amounts, you can click the Payer field and select the payer type, then select the adjustment type - write-off or revenue. You can then click the Description field and select the reason for the adjustment. You can then enter the adjustment amounts (s) in the boxes under the Adjustment heading.

text.text: Where can I view the total adjustment amount before posting?

text: The total adjustment amount displays at the bottom of the column. You can view the write-off in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page.

text.text: What action do I take after entering the adjustment details?

text: After entering the adjustment details, you can click Post now. The new balance will display at the bottom of the window. You can view the revenue adjustment in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page.

text.text: Where can I view write-offs or revenue adjustments after posting?

text: You can view the revenue adjustment in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page. You can also view the write-off in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page.

text.text: Can I see the balance adjustments on the Claim page?

text: Yes, you can see the balance adjustments in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page.

text.text: Which tab on the Claim page displays write-offs or revenue adjustments?

text: You can view the revenue adjustment in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page. You can also view the write-off in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page.

text.text: How do I access the Credits tab on the Claim page?

text: To access the Credits and "Running claim balance" tabs, you must have the "Edit complete claim credits/balance" permission set for your account. To access the "Adjust balance" button, you must have the "Adjustment posting" permission set. To get to the Claim page, enter the claim number in search and then select the number from the Search Results list.

text.text: Where do I find the running claim balance after adjustments?

text: You can find the running claim balance after adjustments in the Credits, Running Claim Balance, and Running Charge Balance tabs on the Claim page.

text.text: Are there specific payers for which claim balances cannot be adjusted during payment posting?

text: Claim balances can be adjusted during payment posting for primary commercial payers, except for facility, collections, or state debt payers.

text.text: How to Adjust the Claim Balance During Payment Posting?

text: To adjust the claim balance during payment posting, you can click the "Adjust balance" button on the "Payments" page. You can then select the payer type, adjustment type, and reason for the adjustment. You can also enter the adjustment amounts in the boxes under the "Adjustment" heading. The total adjustment amount will display at the bottom of the column. You can then click "Post now".
